snippet.title: Lost Ember - Official Teaser Trailer 2016
snippet.description:
The first teaser of our upcoming game Lost Ember! Revealed at gamescom 2016.

····················································································

"A last ruler shall come when Inrah turns his face, followed by eternal night."

Explore the remains of a fallen world from fascinating perspectives! Slip into the role of different animals to uncover the fate of an ancient world. Dive into deep waters, fly at lofty heights, dig underground as a mole or even climb steep cliffs with a mountain goat, there are lots of ways of getting around.

With a wolf as your main character a determined companion will tell a story of loyalty, despair and betrayal that led to the fall of a whole world.

Soon on kickstarter - visit www.lostember.com for more information and subscribe to our newsletter!


Music produced by our partners Solid Audioworks for Lost Ember.


Find us at:

FACEBOOK /lostember
TWITTER @MooneyeStudios
INSTAGRAM @mooneyestudios
TUMBLR mooneyestudios.tumblr.com


Copyright © Mooneye Studios 2016
